item.title: BTI
item.description: score:46 Chances: Despite the decline in revenue at the Marlboro maker, high-yield dividend stocks are trading at bargain-bin prices, providing potential for a good entry point for investors. The ongoing roller-coaster in the market presents an opportunity for resilience and strategic prowess across divergent industries, including the tobacco sector.
